features.one: Homepage with a banner, featured jobs, find seekers, blog, contact form and footer with some info. And also has some routes in Navbar.
features.two: After login, users can select their role whether he or she is HR or Job Seeker then they can post as their role. then post data will go in Mongodb.
features.three: In Dashboard, All will see their post specifically for manageing and here admin has various types of power to manage whole website.

technology: Next JS, Tailwind CSS with DaisyUI, Firebase, Toast, MongoDB, Git collaborate & Vercel

features.one: Homepage with a carousel banner, Instructors and Classes sections with an animation and some blogs
features.two: Also has a login button, so that students can login & select their courses. After selecting, students will make payment for it via Stripe.
features.three: In Dashboard, An admin has the authority to promote a student to the role of an instructor.

technology: React JS, Tailwind CSS(DaisyUI), Firebase, Express JS, Stripe, MongoDB

features.one: Homepage with a carousel banner, top 3 colleges and graduate photos of students of these colleges and some research paper links with students' reviews.
features.two: Also has 3 basic pages, here users can see some colleges and Admission route for admitting then see details in My College route that is protected.
features.three: After user register, they can see photo in navbar. By clicking the image, user go to their details route.

technology: React JS, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Sweetalert, Firebase, Express & Node JS, vercel & MongoDB.
